Summary: 2nd occurence;saw it while at pluckers off hwy 190 killeen tx;1st time witnessed by 2 family members and i;jacqueline alvarez my mom left report @your site mths. ago.
divs: Sighting Detailsmy mom sent my dad and i to pluckers off hwy 190 killeen tx;i stepped outside, looked to my left and saw a golden orange object; looked like a big lamp post light. it was really close and hovered in place it was roundish; then it lifted with great speed and started blinking on and off red n white lights; then it turned off lights after the lights played in circular motion. i was so startled i called my mom 3 times to tell her what i saw ani am 27 yrs old! imagine. her mom saw a uso in pr. in 1959, she was 15 (grandma). my mom, step dad, and i saw one @ 905 west green ave triangular in shape displaying lights. same city killeen tx 76541. couple of months ago mom left message this way dates are accurate. i was very nervous n felt startled till 20 minutes later when we got home.
